keyPolicies.policyDescription: A further £400 income tax cut for 29 million workers across the UK.
Putting the 'triple lock' on increasing pensions into law.
Continue to tackle the deficit - whilst creating more jobs.

issues.economy: AN INCOME TAX CUT: A further £400 income tax cut for 29 million workers across the UK. TACKLING THE DEFICIT: Continue to tackle the deficit - whilst creating more jobs.
issues.governance: TACKLING THE DEFICIT: Continue to tackle the deficit - whilst creating more jobs.
issues.socialWelfare: BETTER PENSIONS: Putting the 'triple lock' on increasing pensions into law.

endorsements.endorsement: I'd govern like a true Tory if it wasn't for the Lib Dems

quotes.text: The Conservatives won't balance the budget in a way that's fair...
I'd govern like a true Tory if it wasn't for the Lib Dems

images.caption: David Lee with supporters holding Liberal Democrats placards

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet highlights criticism of Conservative policies including: 'Hire at Will' proposals, funding cuts to services linked to the NHS, and allowing private companies to run schools at a profit.
